conclusion: Analyze the circuit in two stages: before and after the switch is opened.
When the switch is closed, capacitors are in parallel and resistors are in series.
Current I through the circuit is 1.0 A.
Voltage across each capacitor is 6.0 V.
Charge stored on each capacitor is 180 μC.
When the switch is opened, capacitors are in series with each other and resistors.
Total capacitance C_total of capacitors in series is 15 μF.
Total charge Q_total stored in capacitors is 360 μC.
Charge passing through R_1 is 360 μC.
Final answer: 360 μC passes through R_1 after the switch is opened.
